name: Sakura Wars/Sakura Taisen (樱花大战) (Matsubara Hidenori/松原秀典)(Kousuke Fujishima/藤岛康介) - Artist Style
description:
The material mainly comes from "Sakura Wars" (Matsubara Hideyoshi Collection), and the V1 version imitates the hand drawn retro style,

I'd recommend using a weight value 0.6~1.2,

animevae.pt is good for this model,

For my tests I have used scmix_NSM.ckpt

素材主要来自《樱花大战》（松原秀典画集），V1版本模仿手绘复古画风，

推荐权重：0.6~1.2

推荐vae：animevae.pt

推荐模型：scmix_NSM.ckpt
